s: Summary: Open‑access Sauna & Plunge facility operating 7 am‑10 pm, offering a quick recovery spot between conference sessions.
Topics: Biohacking, stress mitigation, circulatory health, micro‑networking in wellness spaces.
Speakers: Facility staff; no formal speakers.
r: Rejuvenate energy levels for sustained conference participation.
Engage in spontaneous conversations in a relaxed setting.
Differentiate personal brand by embracing cutting‑edge wellness trends.
